title.narrative: CHILDREN WITHOUT PARENTAL CARE

description.narrative: 3.3 Children without parental care have access to institutions and programmes that facilitate their personal development and family or community insertion., which contributes to Access To Justice, Access To Justice (Covid), Child Protection Systems, Child Protection â€“ General, Child Protection â€“ Strengthen Families And Communities, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2020, children and adolescents, especially the most disadvantaged, benefit from a violence-free environment, a child protection system that guarantees a quality and appropriate response, and a juvenile justice system in compliance with international standards.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: 3.3 Children without parental care have access to institutions and programmes that facilitate their personal development andfamily or community insertion.

description.narrative: During the reporting period UNICEF achieved significant progress on the protection of children without parental care. The strategy included policy and law transformations, quality and solid evidence production for policy development and national government and provinces’ capacities strengthening to promote changes and transformations for children and adolescents in alternative care programs. | Status:Met | As-of Date:18/08/2021
